statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (10,-3) and (3,-6).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{6}-{\left(-{3}\right)}}}{{{3}-{\left({10}\right)}}}=-\frac{{3}}{{-{{7}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{3}}{{7}} (if it's not already reduced)
